Posts.Content: I was in a choir that performed the beautiful song "Linden Lea." I love the way the words sound...so liquid. You can listen to it here: https://youtu.be/TDy3QKu6aPs (I don't know how to create a working link on this board. Highlight the line above (which you can do by triple-clicking it), right-click, and choose "open in a new tab/window")
